pages.text: The Chroma Salvager is an item which can be used to recycle extra or unwanted chromatic curios and receive a Chroma Shard or Essence of Ascension in return. If a Super Curio is salvaged, it also returns its standard variant. It targets the item in the opposite hand.
When salvaging an item, the Chroma Salvager takes durability damage. It can salvage 8 items before breaking, however accepts durability-related enchantments such as Unbreaking and Mending.
